data.title: The Limit
data.equation: For the function $f(x) = \frac{8-x^{3}}{x^{2}-4}$ answer each of the following questions.
data.prompt: Evaluate the function at the following values of  x  compute (accurate to at least 8 decimal places).
data.followUpPrompt: Use the information from (a) to estimate the value of \lim\limits_{ x \to 2 } \frac{8-x3}{x^{2}-4}
